posts.title: Ninja Star Magnets
posts.content: Keep your fridge organized like a true ninja would with these deadly ninja star magnets. These strong and durable magnets are great for giving your fridge at home a fierce look to it without actually penetrating it with real ninja stars.

posts.title: Solar Powered Backpack
posts.content: Trek through mother nature without losing touch with the modern world by keeping your phone charged using this solar powered backpack. This waterproof pack features a 7 watt solar panel capable of charging your phone in just 3 to 4 hours.

posts.title: Unicorn Snot Glitter Gel
posts.content: Sparkle as bright as a beautiful majestic creature by spreading some unicorn snot over your skin. Available in a series of vibrant hues like yellow, pink, turquoise, and silver, this glitter gel features a delightful scent and can be applied on both the face and body.

posts.title: Pro Thumb Wrestling Arena
posts.content: Get serious about your thumb wrestling career by stepping up to the big leagues with this pro thumb wrestling arena. This fun-sized ring will make your next thumb battle look like a high-stakes pro-wrestling match – just like on TV!

posts.title: Mini Bike Tool
posts.content: Always be prepared when you hit the trails by bringing along the mini bike tool. This extremely versatile and compact device allows you to conveniently carry a multitude of tools critical for making minor repairs should a situation arise.

posts.title: Heart Rate Monitor Wristband
posts.content: Keep an eye on the old ticker as you perform your daily physical activities by wearing the heart rate monitor wristband. It tracks your heart rate, workouts, and calories burned and displays them on a convenient OLED display.

posts.title: Cardboard Boombox
posts.content: The old and new clash beautifully to bring you your favorite tunes with the cardboard boombox. This retro amplifier is easy to assemble and provides an effective way of playing your favorite music out loud. It’s stylish, unique, and way lighter than a real boombox.

posts.title: Ice Cream Sandwich Maker
posts.content: Enjoy a savory ice cream sandwich whenever the mood strikes by whipping some up using this special mold. It comes with an easy to follow chocolaty recipe and features a convenient design that lets you pop them out like ice cubes when they’re ready.

posts.title: The Wu-Tang Manual
posts.content: Delve deep into the minds of your favorite hip-hop group with the Wu-Tang manual. Intended to go hand in hand with their album – Enter The Wu-Tang: 36 Chambers – it serves as an introduction to the basic principles and artistry of their music.

posts.title: Periodic Beer Glass
posts.content: The periodic beer glass is the intellectual’s mug of choice. It displays the beryllium and erbium elements whose symbols coincidentally also spell out beer. More importantly, they help demonstrate how chemistry can be fun when applied to the real world.

posts.title: Ten Person Circular Float
posts.content: Catch some cancerous sun rays and enjoy the water while you socialize with bestest buddies on the ten person circular float. The float’s circular shape works perfectly for talking to others and also features a large central mesh deck for additional seating.

posts.title: Motion Activated Unicorn Light
posts.content: Protect your little ones against all types of monsters and things that go bump in the night by placing this motion activated unicorn light in their room. It’s easily mountable and turns on and off automatically when it senses movement.
